seed_pair.target: I watched the football and then I watched a film.
seed_pair.known: Vi el fútbol y luego vi una película.

seed_pair.target: He's trying to tell me what he wants
seed_pair.known: Está intentando decirme lo que quiere.

seed_pair.target: He's going to ask you tomorrow.
He would give you an answer if he could.
seed_pair.known: Te daría una respuesta si pudiera.

seed_pair.target: The man is trying to help me.
That man is going to tell me something new.
seed_pair.known: Ese hombre va a decirme algo nuevo.

seed_pair.target: That man has just started to practise speaking.
seed_pair.known: Ese hombre acaba de empezar a practicar el habla.

seed_pair.target: That woman would help you if she could.
seed_pair.known: Esa mujer te ayudaría si pudiera.

seed_pair.target: I know a young man who wants to work with you.
seed_pair.known: Conozco a un hombre joven que quiere trabajar contigo.
